alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Yakutat; Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 10:44PM AKST until February 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...MORE SNOW FOR PARTS OF THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE TONIGHT... Snow is expected again overnight Friday night. Petersburg has been dropped from the advisories as of this update due to temperatures expected to be too warm for significant snowfall. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, except 5 to 6 inches for Yakutat. * WHERE...Yakutat, Haines, and Juneau areas. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy snow will reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some mixing with rain is possible Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already occurring or imminent.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Yakutat; Haines Borough and Klukwan
